archived.description: Indicates whether the keyword is archived or not.

id.description: The unique identifier for the keyword.

parent_id.description: The ID of the parent keyword if this is a child keyword.

parent_type.description: The type of the parent keyword if this is a child keyword (category, theme, etc).

type.description: The type of keyword (brand, generic, long-tail, etc).

bid.description: The bid value associated with the keyword for advertising purposes.

match_type.description: The type of matching used for the keyword (exact, phrase, broad, etc).

value.description: The actual text value of the keyword.
